title: Authorizes installation of speed bumps and traffic spikes on highway ramps
summary: Authorizes installation of speed bumps and traffic spikes on ramps of highways to prevent motorists from entering highways in the wrong direction.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3436

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 25, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CALHOUN, THIELE, McDONOUGH, CASTRO -- Multi-Spon-
         sored by -- M. of A.  CROUCH, LANCMAN -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Transportation

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  highway law, in relation to the installation of
         certain speed bumps

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  highway law is amended by adding a new section 67 to
    2  read as follows:
    3    S 67. INSTALLATION OF SPEED BUMPS AND TRAFFIC SPIKES.  1. THE  COMMIS-
    4  SIONER  SHALL INSTALL SPEED BUMPS AND TRAFFIC SPIKES ON HIGHWAY RAMPS TO
    5  PREVENT MOTORISTS FROM ENTERING STATE CONTROLLED HIGHWAYS IN  THE  WRONG
    6  DIRECTION.  THE  COMMISSIONER  SHALL  PROMULGATE  RULES, REGULATIONS AND
    7  REQUIREMENTS:
    8    A. ESTABLISHING THE NUMBER OF TRAFFIC SPIKE UNITS TO BE USED; AND
    9    B. ESTABLISHING THE PLACEMENT AND USE OF SUCH UNITS.
   10    2. THE COMMISSIONER IS AUTHORIZED AND DIRECTED TO PROMULGATE ANY OTHER
   11  RULES AND REGULATIONS NECESSARY FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE PROVISIONS
   12  OF THIS SECTION.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   14  it shall have become a law.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02871-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to the installation of certain speed bumps
